title: The Christmas That Almost Wasn’t But Then Was
description: A low-budget, but family favorite Christmas musical about a Christmas that just barely happened.
altHero: three goblins in striped shirts stand next to a concerned Santa
alt1: Santa talks with an elf next to two reindeer cardboard cutouts
alt2: three goblins dance walk in unison
alt3: a goblin pushes over a stool and toy an elf was working on
alt4: the goblin woos a Little Bo Peep type woman, a man with tray of coffees is stunned in the background realizing he’s in the shot
